# Title: Elder Services Tender Notice (ACAN) 

## Document ID: 21301-25-4656136

**Publication Date**: February 20, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: March 6, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

**Procurement Overview**

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities for the provision of Elder Services. The successful supplier will provide spiritual and cultural guidance to Indigenous offenders. This is a limited tender notice, with only one pre-identified supplier selected.

**Contract Summary**

* Contract value: CAD $281,658.76 (GST/HST extra)
* Contract duration: 1 year with an option to extend for 2 additional years
* Expected start date: April 1, 2024
* Expected end date: March 31, 2025

**Services Required**

The successful supplier will provide the following services:

* Ceremonial and Spiritual Services: Offer spiritual guidance and counseling to Indigenous offenders
* Advice and Guidance: Provide advice to staff and management on Indigenous spirituality and cultural practices
* Case Management: Participate in case conferences and provide updates to the Case Management Team

**Eligibility Criteria**

To be eligible, suppliers must meet the following criteria:

* Be recognized by their community as an Elder/Cultural Advisor
* Have at least 5 years of experience delivering spiritual and cultural services to Indigenous people
* Be familiar with and able to conduct various ceremonies with a focus on healing
* Meet with a circle of Elders already under contract with CSC to validate their statement of capabilities

**Submission Guidelines**

Suppliers interested in submitting a statement of capabilities must do so in writing to the contact person identified in this notice by February 27, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

**Contact Information**

For inquiries and submissions, please contact:

Kim Lavallée
Acting Regional Supply and Contract Officer
Correctional Service Canada
Phone: (514) 235-9156
Email: [kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca)
